entries.name: Effect: Aberrant Blood Magic
entries.description: Aberrant whispers shield one target's mind or your own, granting a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Accept Echo
entries.description:
While in this state, you become trained in the weapon you chose and an expert in the skill you chose. Additionally, while you're in this state, the echo can speak and interact with the Material Plane using your body, and you gain a +4 status bonus to all saves against possession effects, as the possessing spirit protects you from other possessions.

This state lasts for 10 minutes, after which the echo disappears completely until the next time you make your daily preparations. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} this effect.

At 7th level you become a master of the skill you chose, at 13th level you become an expert with the weapon you chose, and at 15th level you become legendary with the skill you chose.

entries.name: Effect: Accursed Clay Fist
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tMsAj0H0B9XZQjtH]{Accursed Clay Fist}

You take a -2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.

entries.name: Effect: Aldori Parry
entries.description:
Requirements You are wielding only an Aldori dueling sword and have your other hand or hands free.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirement.

entries.name: Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.

entries.name: Effect: Align Armament (Evil)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.

entries.name: Effect: Align Armament (Good)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.

entries.name: Effect: Align Armament (Lawful)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.

entries.name: Effect: Ancestor Curse
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.qvRlih3u7vK3FYUR]{Ancestors}

entries.name: Effect: Angelic Blood Magic
entries.description: An angelic aura protects you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.

entries.name: Effect: Arcane Propulsion
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YgytD4HGjWNFwiev]{Arcane Propulsion}.

entries.name: Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.

entries.name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Success)
entries.description: Your armor has been tampered with! You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{flat-footed} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

entries.name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success)
entries.description: Your armor has been tampered with! You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{flat-footed} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

entries.name: Effect: Ashes Curse
entries.description: Note: neither the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} conditions are applied automatically in the moderate curse.

entries.name: Effect: Assisting Shot
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their roll.

entries.name: Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you critically hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their roll.

entries.name: Effect: Augment Senses
entries.description: Until the start of your next turn, you can't be flanked.

entries.name: Effect: Aura of Despair
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wjnfdh6WzN7HbmeE]{Aura Of Despair}

Enemies within 15 of you take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against fear.

entries.name: Effect: Aura of Faith
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7sFhBYoz5GSBFNbY]{Aura of Faith}

Each good-aligned ally within 15 feet deal an extra 1 good damage against evil creatures on their first Strike that hits an evil creature each round.

entries.name: Effect: Aura of Life
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YawVDUc9uzREIAnO]{Aura of Life}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to saves against necromancy effects.

entries.name: Effect: Aura of Preservation
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura Of Preservation}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

entries.name: Effect: Aura of Righteousness
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.erCOcFZJPT2O3gwC]{Aura of Righteousness}

You and all allies within 15 feet gain evil resistance 5.

entries.name: Effect: Avenge in Glory
entries.description:
Frequency once per day

Access mountain dwarf ethnicity

Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition.

You honor your ally's life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoints based on level
  • Sets a circumstance bonus of +1 to attack and damage rolls

entries.name: Effect: Azarketi Purification
entries.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.u94fcPT5Oukqzql5]{Azarketi Purification}

entries.name: Effect: Battle Curse
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.gjOGOR30Czpnx3tM]{Battle}

Note: The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} condition is not applied for the major curse

entries.name: Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity
entries.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Battle Medicine from that person for the duration.

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune
entries.description:
An anarchic rune is jagged and asymmetrical, channeling chaotic energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage against lawful targets. If you are lawful, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at a Strike with this weapon against a lawful creature, roll 1d6. On a 1 or 2, you deal double minimum damage; on a 3 or 4, double your damage normally; on a 5 or 6, you deal double maximum damage.

Craft Requirements You are chaotic.

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune
entries.description:
Complex and symmetrical, an axiomatic rune imbues a weapon with lawful energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage against chaotic targets. If you are chaotic, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at an attack roll with this weapon against a chaotic creature, instead of rolling, count each weapon damage die as average damage rounded up (3 for d4, 4 for d6, 5 for d8, 6 for d10, 7 for d12).

Craft Requirements You are lawful.

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune
entries.description: A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra [[/r {1d6}[positive]]]{1d6 positive damage} to undead. On a critical hit, the undead is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Greater)
entries.description:
A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra [[/r {2d6}[positive]]]{2d6 positive damage} to undead. On a critical hit, the undead creature must attempt a DC 34 Fortitude save with the following effects. This is an incapacitation effect.

Critical Success It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

Success It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn.

Failure It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure It's destroyed.

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune
entries.description: When you critically hit with this weapon, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune
entries.description: This weapon is empowered by flickering flame. The weapon deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} on a successful Strike, plus [[/r {1d10}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical hit.

entries.id: Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune
entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune
entries.description: The weapon can harm creatures without physical form. A ghost touch weapon is particularly effective against incorporeal creatures, which almost always have a specific vulnerability to ghost touch weapons. Incorporeal creatures can touch, hold, and wield ghost touch weapons (unlike most physical objects).

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune
entries.description:
Holy weapons command powerful celestial energy. A weapon with this rune deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[good]]]{1d6 good damage} against evil targets. If you are evil, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against an evil creature with the weapon

Effect You regain HP equal to double the evil creature's level. This is a good, positive, healing effect.

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune
entries.description: The edges of a keen weapon are preternaturally sharp. Attacks with this weapon are a critical hit on a 19 on the die as long as that result is a success. This property has no effect on a 19 if the result would be a failure.

entries.name: Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune
entries.description:
An unholy rune instills fiendish power into the etched weapon. A weapon with this rune deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[evil]]]{1d6 evil damage} when it hits a good target. If you are good, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against a good creature with the weapon

Effect The target takes [[/r {1d8}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} per weapon damage die of the etched weapon.

entries.name: Effect: Blizzard Evasion
entries.description: You gain resistance 10 to physical damage and weakness 10 to force damage. You gain a fly speed of 40 feet.

entries.name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical Failure)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a critical failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -4 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

entries.name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

entries.name: Effect: Bone Swarm
entries.description:
You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a 2-action activity, you can deal [[/r 10d6[bludgeoning]]] damage to all creatures sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. You also retain the benefits of skeleton feats that don't require communication or the use of hands.

entries.name: Effect: Brightness Seeker
entries.description:
Trigger You attempt an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw while performing the course of action from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, but you haven't rolled yet.

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +2 status bonus if the result of the augury was woe and you proceeded anyway.

entries.name: Effect: Bristle
entries.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1gAehVvstGY885kJ]{Bristle}

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: 効果: 軌道演算
entries.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Fha8jFmfkOPxAsrZ]{起動演算}による効果。

次の手番の開始時まで、ACと反応セーヴに+2状況ボーナスを得る。

entries.name: Effect: Cat Nap
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zvtYsz9jk8tPvlpS]{Cat Nap}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Effect: Catfolk Dance
entries.description: The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves

entries.name: Effect: Cavalier's Banner
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{Cavalier's Banner}

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

entries.name: Effect: Celestial Wings
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.vtCrMziYxNyj8kP7]{Celestial Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed while you've manifested your wings.

entries.name: Effect: Ceremony of Protection
entries.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Channel the Godmind
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.DYFOlJlMoDuHjrZx]{Channel The Godmind}.

entries.name: Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)
entries.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

entries.name: Effect: Control Tower
entries.description: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.

entries.name: Effect: Core Cannon
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.zeyrLJr6b7hPdx4w]{Core Cannon}.

entries.name: Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

entries.name: Effect: Corpse-Killer's Defiance (Lower Level)
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

entries.name: Effect: Crimson Shroud
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.M2V1vqAziOkWV30B]{Crimson Shroud}.

entries.name: Effect: Current Spell (Air)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the air trait.

This effect has the air trait.

entries.name: Effect: Current Spell (Water)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the water trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the water trait.

This effect has the water trait.

entries.name: Effect: Daydream Trance
entries.description: You take a -1 penalty to Perception checks and initiative rolls and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects. If you're legendary in Occultism, the bonus against mental effects increases to +3 .

entries.name: Effect: Debilitating Strike
entries.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

entries.name: Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -10 foot status penalty to Speed and a -4 status penalty to Stealth.

entries.name: Effect: Decry Thief (Success)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -5 foot status penalty to Speed and a -2 status penalty to Stealth.

entries.name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure)
entries.description: The target takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure)
entries.description: The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Success)
entries.description: The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Defensive Instincts
entries.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RxA1PdgGbijkieJD]{Defensive Instincts}

Requirements you are adjacent to at least two enemies

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.

entries.name: Effect: Defensive Recovery
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]{Defensive Recovery}.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} on a single target and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Self)
entries.description: The corruption of sin makes you more imposing. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target)
entries.description: The corruption of sin weakens a target's defenses. A target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.

entries.name: Effect: Diabolic Blood Magic (Self)
entries.description: Hellfire fills your tongue with lies. You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Discordant Voice
entries.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW]{Discordant Voice}, while you are affected by Inspire Courage.

entries.name: Effect: Distracting Feint
entries.description: While a creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} by your Feint, it also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

entries.name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.

entries.name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.

entries.name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Force)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 force damage.

entries.name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Good)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.

entries.name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.

entries.name: Effect: Draconic Blood Magic
entries.description: Draconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Dragon's Rage Wings
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.bqZkAFS6eq9TKXMO]{Dragon's Rage Wings}

While you are raging, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

entries.name: Effect: Dread Marshal Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

entries.name: Effect: Educate Allies (Ally)
entries.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies}.

entries.name: Effect: Educate Allies (Self)
entries.description: Granted by using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies} on your allies.

entries.name: Effect: Elemental Assault
entries.description: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic. Choose one element. Until the end of your next turn, your Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d6]] damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, or cold for water.

entries.name: Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self)
entries.description: Elemental energy surrounds you. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl]{Emblazon Antimagic}.

When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract level. If they attempt to do so, the emblazoned symbol immediately disappears.

entries.name: Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 acid damage, or an extra 1d6 acid damage if you have a domain spell with the acid trait.

entries.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 cold damage, or an extra 1d6 cold damage if you have a domain spell with the cold trait.

entries.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electricity)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 electricity damage, or an extra 1d6 electricity damage if you have a domain spell with the electricity trait.

entries.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 fire damage, or an extra 1d6 fire damage if you have a domain spell with the fire trait.

entries.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 sonic damage, or an extra 1d6 sonic damage if you have a domain spell with the sonic trait.

entries.name: 効果: 感情の波
entries.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.d8DI7wLxtUy99g9K]による効果。

君は攻撃ロールと技能判定に+2ステータス・ボーナスを得る。

entries.name: Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike
entries.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike} if the rogue also has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.RzfWrOqHL2GcK0rr]{Enduring Debilitation}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

entries.name: Effect: Energize Wings
entries.description: You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Effect: Enforce Oath
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YZ138OqflDhrkqmR]{Enforce Oath}.

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

However, your dedication to Enforcing your Oath draws your focus away from all other foes. While you are Enforcing your Oath, you take a -1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

You stop Enforcing your Oath once the chosen creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points or offers a legitimate surrender to you or your allies. You immediately stop Enforcing your Oath if you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or if the chosen creature goes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{Unnoticed} by you for more than 1 minute. You can also stop Enforcing your Oath at any time during your turn as a free action.

entries.name: Effect: Engine of Destruction
entries.description: Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Favorable Winds
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.OK8Fm7EG8wjoYZBX]{Favorable Winds}.

You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.

entries.name: Effect: Fey Blood Magic
entries.description: Colorful fey glamours dance around you or one target, causing them to be concealed for 1 round. Such obvious concealment can't be used to Hide.

entries.name: Effect: Fiendish Wings
entries.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

entries.name: Effect: Flamboyant Cruelty
entries.description: Granted when you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SAOtGk9k8veaX3Ww]{Flamboyant Cruelty}

entries.name: Effect: Fleet Tempo
entries.description: You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.

entries.name: Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.

entries.name: Effect: Formation Training
entries.description:
Granted by Formation Training

You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

entries.name: Effect: Fortify Shield
entries.description: Add your level to your shield's Hardness.

entries.name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Self)
entries.description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. You gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target)
entries.description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Great Tengu Form
entries.description:
Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}.

This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.

entries.name: Effect: Guided by the Stars
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.s1swBWSqtfrXTJHK]{Guided by the Stars}

You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

entries.name: Effect: Hag Blood Magic
entries.description: Spiteful curses punish your foes. The first creature that deals damage to you before the end of your next turn takes 2 mental damage per spell level and must attempt a basic Will save.

entries.name: Effect: Hamstringing Strike
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.s2GbcUIXG1ZBurSd]{Hamstringing Strike}

If you hit your prey, the creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed.

entries.name: Effect: Harsh Judgement
entries.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

entries.name: Effect: Heaven's Thunder
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

With a loud shout, you unleash your ki in a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs your body. Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and weapons you wield that have the monk trait deal additional electricity damage equal to one-half your level and additional sonic damage equal to one-half your level.

If you also know the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oo7YcRC2gcez81PV]{Ki Blast} ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead). Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you also takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved.

entries.name: Effect: Heroes' Call
entries.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

entries.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains three bonuses until the end of its next turn: a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed, a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

entries.name: Effect: Hungry Goblin
entries.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

entries.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry
entries.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Hunter's Edge: Flurry} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

entries.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit
entries.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Hunter's Edge: Outwit} with you.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the prey, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against your prey's attacks.

entries.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision
entries.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Hunter's Edge: Precision} with you.

You have trained to aim for your prey's weak points. The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage. (Precision damage increases the damage you already deal, using the same type, but is ineffective against creatures that lack vital organs or weak points.)

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

entries.name: Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin)
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Change Shape}.

In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.

entries.name: Effect: Hydration
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.vt67b8uoNEbskcBv]{Hydration} if you spend 24 hours outside of water.

entries.name: Effect: Hydraulic Deflection
entries.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kqRFoXfErUFEndIs]{Hydraulic Deflection}

entries.name: Effect: Imperial Blood Magic
entries.description: A surge of ancestral memories grants you or one target a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Inspired Stratagem
entries.description: You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.

entries.name: Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

entries.name: Effect: Inspiring Resilience
entries.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.

entries.name: Effect: Juvenile Flight
entries.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

entries.name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VU7aZC7L08Mk1GVA]{Esoteric Oath (Liberator)}.

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

entries.name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.K3QkcNWY8qpNEJrk]{Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

entries.name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uv235v6hXCITAFej]{Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

entries.name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lDfOzhKJoTCkLPtn]{Shining Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

entries.name: Effect: Life-Giving Magic
entries.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

entries.id: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
entries.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

entries.id: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
entries.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

entries.name: Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)
entries.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**

entries.name: Effect: Maiden's Mending
entries.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Marshal's Aura
entries.description:
Granted by being inside a Marshal's Aura.

Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

entries.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
entries.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

entries.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
entries.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.

entries.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
entries.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1d8 precision damage.

At 19th level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1d8 precision damage.

entries.name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations
entries.description: The target is unable to flank or provide flanking.

entries.name: Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

entries.name: Effect: Mountain Stronghold
entries.description: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Mutate Weapon
entries.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.

entries.name: Effect: Nanite Surge
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

entries.name: Effect: Necrotic Infusion
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6erzXaxxvcXYnL9H]{Necrotic Infusion}.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} to restore Hit Points to a single undead creature, the target then deals an additional 1d6 negative damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the harm spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, and if the harm spell is at least 8th level, the damage increases to 3d6.

entries.name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self)
entries.description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, granting you a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target)
entries.description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, imposing a -1 status bonus to Will saves for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success)
entries.description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

entries.name: Effect: Overdrive (Success)
entries.description: Your gizmos go into overdrive, adding power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

entries.name: Effect: Overwatch Field
entries.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

entries.name: Effect: Panache
entries.description:
You care as much about the way you accomplish something as whether you actually accomplish it in the first place. When you perform an action with particular bravado, you can leverage this moment of verve to perform spectacular, deadly maneuvers. This state of flair is called panache, and you are either in a state of panache or you are not.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}

entries.name: Effect: Perfect Resistance
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]{Perfect Resistance}

After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

entries.name: Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon
entries.description: The chosen weapon deals an extra 1d6 positive damage.

entries.name: Effect: Prevailing Position
entries.description:
Granted by using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

entries.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)
entries.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

entries.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)
entries.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

entries.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)
entries.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

entries.name: Effect: Protective Spirit Mask
entries.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.

Granted By:@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}

entries.name: 効果: サイキックの共感
entries.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]による効果。

次の手番の開始時まで君は〈欺瞞〉、〈交渉〉、〈威圧〉判定、そして「@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]」のための知覚判定に+1状況ボーナスを得る。

entries.name: Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)
entries.description: The border between life and death becomes blurred to you. You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Purifying Breeze
entries.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

entries.name: Effect: Push Back the Dead!
entries.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead.

entries.name: Effect: Radiant Circuitry
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.2XmdYW8OsAvjGDG3]{Radiant Circuitry}.

entries.name: Effect: Radiant Infusion
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Radiant Infusion}.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} to restore Hit Points to a single living creature, the target deals an additional 1d6 positive damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the heal spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, or 3d6 if the spell is at least 8th level.

entries.name: Effect: Rage
entries.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoint based on level and con mod
  • Enables rage property for rage damage
  • Sets token effect

entries.name: Effect: Rampaging Form
entries.description:
You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r 3d6[fire]]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

entries.name: Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)
entries.description:
You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r 3d6[cold]]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

entries.name: Effect: Read Shibboleths
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them

entries.name: Effect: Reanimator Dedication
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Animate Dead}.

entries.name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
entries.description: For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

entries.name: Effect: Renewed Vigor
entries.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier.

entries.name: Effect: Repair Module
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ZGT7NLpcvREkJsMd]{Repair Module}.

entries.name: Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)
entries.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

entries.name: Effect: Safeguard Soul
entries.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.

entries.name: Effect: Saoc Astrology
entries.description:
This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Note: The effect lasts until the end of your turn, and should be manually removed after you have made a skill check.

entries.name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Perception)
entries.description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, imposing a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth)
entries.description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth for 1 round.

entries.name: Effect: Shadow Sight
entries.description: You gain Greater Darkvision for 1 minute.

entries.name: Effect: Shared Avoidance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}.

Allies within 15 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

entries.name: Effect: Shared Clarity
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}.

Allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

entries.name: Effect: Shed Tail
entries.description: You take a -2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.

entries.name: Effect: Shield Ally
entries.description: The hardness of your equipped shield increases by 2.

entries.name: Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)
entries.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

entries.name: Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Soaring Flight
entries.description: To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below. You grow a pair of magical wings or expand your existing ones. For 5 minutes, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

entries.name: Effect: Spin Tale
entries.description: You gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Spiral Sworn
entries.description: For 3 rounds, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the level of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

entries.name: Effect: Starlight Armor
entries.description:
The armor grants you resistance 7 to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage. The armor also sheds bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

When you reach 17th level, the resistance increases to 10.

entries.name: Effect: Striking Retribution
entries.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TGlb3gmSKkJBZt5q]{Striking Retribution}

entries.name: Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes
entries.description: You gain darkvision and low-light vision, and you gain a +1 status bonus to visual Perception checks.

entries.name: Effect: Tidal Shield
entries.description: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. You can Sustain the effect to a maximum duration of 5 rounds.

entries.name: Effect: Tiller's Drive
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

entries.name: Effect: Time Curse
entries.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.EslxR2sbDK9XJaAl]{Time}

entries.name: Effect: Topple Giants
entries.description: When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity
entries.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Treat Wounds for the duration.

entries.name: Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

entries.name: Effect: Undying Conviction
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Undying Conviction}

Undead creatures gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist positive damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them controlled.

entries.name: 効果: プシケの解放
entries.description: 君は、ダメージを与える呪文を発動する際、そのダメージに呪文レベルの2倍に等しいステータス・ボーナスを得る。これは、持続時間を持たない呪文かつ、君がサイキックの呪文発動を使って発動した呪文にのみ適用される

entries.name: Effect: Victorious Vigor
entries.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Effect: Watchful Gaze
entries.description: You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

entries.name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical Success)
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

entries.name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success)
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

entries.name: Effect: Wings of Air
entries.description: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

entries.name: Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS)
entries.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you help your less experienced colleagues recognize danger and withstand danger. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to Perception checks and Initiative rolls to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's Perception modifier by 1.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

entries.id: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Bonus - Self)
entries.name: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Bonus - Self)
entries.description: Draconic might carries in your voice. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

entries.id: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Penalty - Target)
entries.name: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Penalty - Target)
entries.description: Draconic might carries in your voice. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.

entries.name: Goblin Song (Critical Success)
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

entries.name: Goblin Song (Success)
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

entries.name: Stance: Arcane Cascade
entries.description:
Requirements You used your most recent action to Cast a Spell or make a Spellstrike.

You divert a portion of the spell's magical power and keep it cycling through your body and weapon using specialized forms, breathing, or footwork. While you're in the stance, your melee Strikes deal [[/r {1}]]{1 extra damage}. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization and 3 if you have greater weapon specialization. Any Strike that benefits from this damage gains the arcane trait, making it magical.

If your most recent spell before entering the stance was one that can deal damage, the damage from the stance is the same type that spell could deal (or one type of your choice if the spell could deal multiple types of damage). If the spell couldn't deal damage, this stance's bonus damage depends on the spell's school.

  • Abjuration or Evocation force
  • Conjuration or Transmutation same type as your weapon or unarmed attack
  • Divination, Enchantment, or Illusion mental
  • Necromancy negative

entries.name: Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance}

You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1d4 negative damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in the clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, and to the DC for creatures to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from you.

entries.name: Stance: Cobra Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

entries.name: Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

entries.name: Stance: Everstand Stance
entries.description: When in this stance, you wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction.

entries.name: Stance: Gorilla Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance}

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

entries.name: Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nRjyyDulHnP5OewA]{Gorilla Pound}, which grants you a climb speed of 15 while you are in this stance.

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

entries.name: Stance: Jellyfish Stance
entries.description:
Requirements You are unarmored.

You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity. You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in Jellyfish Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}.

entries.name: Stance: Monastic Archer Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}

You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using longbows, shortbows, or bows with the monk trait.

You can use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} with these bows. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with these bows when attacking within half the first range increment (normally 50 feet for a longbow and 30 feet for a shortbow), so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike.

entries.name: Stance: Paragon's Guard
entries.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.hPDerDCYmag3s0dP]{Paragon's Guard}.

Requirements You are wielding a shield

Once you've had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

While you are in this stance, you constantly have your shield raised as if you'd used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as long as you meet that action's requirements.

entries.name: Stance: Peafowl Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{Peafowl Stance}

You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can Step as a free action as your next action.

entries.name: Stance: Point-Blank Shot
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{Point-Blank Shot}.

When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.

entries.name: Stance: Rain of Embers Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}

You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames. The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1d4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Rain of Embers Stance, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).

entries.name: Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance
entries.description:
You can make flowing wave attacks that deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the agile, disarm, finesse, nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits.

While in Reflective Ripple Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed and Tripped.

entries.name: Stance: Shooting Stars Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6cQSPqXoAO6oJl0i]{Shooting Stars Stance}

You enter a stance that lets you throw shuriken with lightning speed.

While in this stance, you can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with shuriken instead.

entries.name: Stance: Six Pillars Stance
entries.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT0pVPqFuiEsmRb8]{Six Pillars Stance}

Requirements You are unarmored.

You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed. While in this stance, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by using actions with the concentrate or manipulate traits. In addition, when you cast a spell that requires one or more actions while in this stance, your unarmed Strikes gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage.

entries.name: Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UjEeHamC2C8JfgJz]{Sky and Heaven Stance}

You enter a stance perfected by past champions of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven, allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky. The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits.

While in Sky and Heaven Stance, you gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12th level and to 8 at 18th level.

entries.name: Stance: Stoked Flame Stance
entries.description:
Requirements You're unarmored.

You enter a stance of fast, fiery movements. You can make flashing spark attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. They are in the brawling group and have the forceful, nonlethal, sweep, and unarmed traits. If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes 1d6 persistent fire damage.

While in Stoked Flame Stance, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. If you have incredible movement, increase the benefit from incredible movement to a +15-foot status bonus plus 5 feet for every 4 levels beyond 3rd.

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.

entries.name: Stance: Stumbling Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{Stumbling Stance}

You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements. While in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}.

The only Strikes you can make are stumbling swing unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits. If an enemy hits you with a melee Strike while in this stance, it becomes flat-footed against the next stumbling swing Strike you make against it before the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance
entries.description:
You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points like your rival Shino Hakusa. You gain a vitality blast ranged unarmed Strike that deals [[/r {1d4}[negative]]]{1d4 negative damage}, has a range of 30 feet, and has the unarmed and versatile positive traits.

Additionally, when you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.

entries.name: Stance: Whirling Blade Stance
entries.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IaiEZaA8erufMUCr]{Whirling Blade Stance}

You enter a mindful stance that creates a deep connection between you and your monk weapons, allowing you to manipulate them with your ki even at a distance.

All melee Monk weapons you wield with the finesse trait gain the thrown 10 feet trait (unless they already have the thrown trait with a greater range).

Once you've made a thrown Strike with such a weapon, you can use the precision of your throw to make additional Strikes with it, even from a distance. Start from the space of the previous Strike's target to determine the range increment and whether the new target has cover.
